ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes or concepts that identify patients as former users of smokeless tobacco products.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Assessment, Performed for "Tobacco Use Status" as an attribute of result. The intent of this data element is to identify patients as former users of smokeless tobacco products.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with SNOMED CT codes identifying former users of smokeless tobacco products.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to former users of smoking tobacco products or former users of non-tobacco products (e.g. e-cigarettes).)
